Text.Page:
The researchers in the {@Rgn:46016} keep running into research obstacles of the argon variety.

We're trying to identify weaknesses in the argons, but our researchers are scholars, not venators. They're not trained for battle.

Head over there and meet with Ashinne. She'll know how you can help.

The Invalesco welcomes all assistance.

We mostly need the forceful acquisition of research materials. Sometimes we'll need samples from argonomorph {@LinkCreature:46#301#sikandaris}, {@LinkCreature:46#303#blood fiends}, or {@LinkCreature:46#304#jalmaraks}.

Research needs change from day to day. Try to roll with them.

Oh, look! Contaminated feathers from {@LinkCreature:46#301#argonomorph sikandaris}. Fine examples, too.

These specimens quicken this scholar's heart!

We're curious about the {@LinkCreature:46#301#argonomorph sikandaris} found in the {@Rgn:46008}.

We'd like to study their feathers.

Such a stench!

We really shouldn't complain since we ordered the hearts, but...

Ah, the sacrifices we make in the pursuit of knowledge.
We wish to examine the hearts from {@LinkCreature:46#303#argonomorph blood fiends}. To transform such a twisted creature, we're certain to learn something astonishing.

Intriguing.

Their foci appear active, but not in the same way as one might find in Sylvanoth, for example.

We'll look into this further. Thank you.

There's a group of {@LinkCreature:46#304#argonomorph jalmaraks} in the {@Rgn:46007}.

We're curious to discern to what extent their link to their fey heritage survived the transformation. Please bring us their foci.
